title: Seasonal variations in soil characteristics control microbial respiration and carbon use under tree plantations in the middle gangetic region
content:
Publication date: 30 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 16

Author(s): Sudip Sarkar, Dipty Kumar Das, Abhinandan Singh, Ranjan Laik, Santosh Kumar Singh, Harold M. van Es, Kavya Krishnan, Amit Kumar Singh, Anup Das, Utkarsh Singh, Hosam O. Elansary, Eman A. Mahmoud
